pddf_dev_types.description: SSE-T8164 - Below is the list of supported PDDF device types (chip names) for various components. If any component uses some other driver, we will create the client using 'echo <dev-address> <dev-type> > <path>/new_device' method

attr_list.bmc_cmd: if [ $(ipmitool raw 0x04 0x2d 0xC4 | cut -c 2-3) = '01' ] || [ $(ipmitool raw 0x04 0x2d 0xC4 | cut -c 2-3) = '0b' ]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x01 0x01 | xxd -r -p | awk -F'-' '{if (substr($2, length($2), 1) == "F") print 1; else print 0;}'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x01 0x04 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000000))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x01 0x0e | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x01 0x02 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 100))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x01 0x03 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 10))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x01 0x07 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000000))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x01 0x05 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x01 0x06 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 10))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x01 0x08 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 140))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x01 0x0a | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x01 0x0c | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000))'
if [ $(ipmitool raw 0x04 0x2d 0xC5 | cut -c 2-3) = '01' ] || [ $(ipmitool raw 0x04 0x2d 0xC5 | cut -c 2-3) = '0b' ]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x02 0x01 | xxd -r -p | awk -F'-' '{if (substr($2, length($2), 1) == "F") print 1; else print 0;}'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x02 0x04 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000000))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x02 0x0e | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x02 0x02 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 100))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x02 0x03 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 10))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x02 0x07 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000000))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x02 0x05 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x02 0x06 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 10))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x02 0x08 | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 140))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x02 0x0a | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000))'
ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0x04 0x02 0x0c | bash -c 'read a b; printf "%x\n" $((0x$b$a * 1000))'
if [ $(ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0xc 0x04) = '00' ]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi
if [ $(ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0xc 0x04) = '00' ]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi
if [ $(ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0xc 0x05) = '00' ]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi
if [ $(ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0xc 0x05) = '00' ]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi
if [ $(ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0xc 0x06) = '00' ]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi
if [ $(ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0xc 0x06) = '00' ]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi
if [ $(ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0xc 0x07) = '00' ]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi
if [ $(ipmitool raw 0x30 0x89 0xc 0x07) = '00' ]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi
ipmitool raw 0x04 0x2D 0x41 | bash -c 'read a b c; printf "%x\n" $((0x$a * 160))'
ipmitool raw 0x04 0x2D 0x42 | bash -c 'read a b c; printf "%x\n" $((0x$a * 160))'

ipmitool raw 0x04 0x2D 0x47 | bash -c 'read a b c; printf "%x\n" $((0x$a * 160))'
